item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 12/5/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Updated the “Upload Audio” to additionally support .m4a, .opus, .ogg, and multi-track formats, as well as file names containing spaces. Removed whitespace checks for “Upload Audio.” Fixed an issue caused by Google Meet updates affecting speaker name detection. Updated the new account onboarding process, allowing users to choose whether to enable “Auto Join Meetings” and “Auto Share Meeting Notes.” 12/2/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Added “Upload Audio”, supporting formats like .
